name: DeathRogue
description:
Move with arrow keys, WASD, Mouse clicking or gamepad. Attacks are also initiated by movement.

Survive in this old school zombie dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels. Fight your way through zombies all the way down to the treasure.

This game is part of a "One Game a Week" streak, so there is not much content, but I would like any feedback:

Twitter: @talecrafter - www.craftinglegends.com

You can make videos / "Let's Play"s of this game however you like.
